txt.en: The salamanders of the Wold give the refugees of Langhold more unease than they like, with the dangerous reptiles wandering so near their makeshift camp.
You have done a great kindness to the refugees at Harwick who survived the siege of Langhold, for the salamanders crept too near to leave them with much comfort. You helped to lessen their hardship.
The salamanders of the Wold give the refugees of Langhold more unease than they like, with the dangerous reptiles wandering so near their makeshift camp.
The Salamanders inhabit the swamp just to the north of Harwick.\n\nYou should defeat salamanders to keep the refugees safe.
You have done a great kindness to the refugees at Harwick who survived the siege of Langhold, for the salamanders crept too near to leave them with much comfort. You helped to lessen their hardship.
